
nv-regexp-flags
=======================
- convert regexp flags-str to a  int compatible-with-v8
- refer to : v8/src/regexp/regexp-flags.h 



install
=======
- npm install nv-regexp-flags

splitted
--------


usage
=====
    
      const { n2s,s2n}   = require("nv-regexp-flags");
 

example
-------
         
         var rgx = /a/gi;
         >   rgx.flags 
         /*"gi"*/


        > s2n("gi")
        3
        > s2n("g")
        1
        > s2n("i")
        2
        >
        > n2s(3)
        'gi'
        > n2s(1)
        'g'
        > n2s(2)
        'i'


METHODS
========
